articles.author: Joe Gould, Jacopo Barigazzi, Chris Lunday
articles.title: Allies use F-35s as leverage against Trump’s tariffs - Politico
articles.description: Countries are questioning their American weapons purchases, in some of their biggest pushback yet to the administration’s tariffs.
articles.content: While most allies arent rushing to pull out of long-planned purchases, the recent actions by the three countries show growing pockets of resistance, and some of the most concrete pushback yet, to Tru… [+5478 chars]
